chat.content:
I will give you a Coq proof state, including both hypotheses and a specific goal and your need to prove it. Your response should be a singular code block of Coq proof starting with "```coq
", ending with "Qed.```", without any additional explanation or commentary. Follow to these guidelines:
Introduce variables using unique names to avoid any conflicts.
Keep each command distinct and separated, avoid concatenations like ';' or '[cmd|cmd]'.
Organize your proof with bullets like '-', '+', and '*' instead of braces ({, }). Shift to their double symbols like '--' and '++', when necessary.
Effectively use given premises, follow the syntax and structure demonstrated in the examples provided.

Example 1:

Hypotheses:
n, m: nat
IHn: m + n = n + m

Goal:
m + S n = S n + m

Your Response:
```coq
simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.
Qed.```

Example 2:
Hypotheses:

Goal:
forall n m : nat, m + n = n + m

Your Response:
```coq
intros n m. induction n.
- simpl. auto.
- simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.
Qed.```

Solve This Proof State:

Hypotheses:
L: Language

Goal:
forall (Q P : Formula -> Set) (f1 : forall t t0 : Term, Q (equal t t0) -> P (equal t t0)) (f2 : forall (r : Relations L) (t : Terms (arity L (inl r))), Q (atomic r t) -> P (atomic r t)) (f3 : forall f : Formula, (Q f -> P f) -> forall f0 : Formula, (Q f0 -> P f0) -> Q (impH f f0) -> P (impH f f0)), (forall (f g : Formula) (z1 z2 : Q f -> P f), (forall q : Q f, z1 q = z2 q) -> forall z3 z4 : Q g -> P g, (forall q : Q g, z3 q = z4 q) -> forall q : Q (impH f g), f3 f z1 g z3 q = f3 f z2 g z4 q) -> forall f4 : forall f : Formula, (Q f -> P f) -> Q (notH f) -> P (notH f), (forall (f : Formula) (z1 z2 : Q f -> P f), (forall q : Q f, z1 q = z2 q) -> forall q : Q (notH f), f4 f z1 q = f4 f z2 q) -> forall f5 : forall (v : nat) (a : Formula), (forall b : Formula, lt_depth b (forallH v a) -> Q b -> P b) -> Q (forallH v a) -> P (forallH v a), (forall (v : nat) (a : Formula) (z1 z2 : forall b : Formula, lt_depth b (forallH v a) -> Q b -> P b), (forall (b : Formula) (q : lt_depth b (forallH v a)) (r : Q b), z1 b q r = z2 b q r) -> forall q : Q (forallH v a), f5 v a z1 q = f5 v a z2 q) -> forall (a : Formula) (q : Q (notH a)), Formula_depth_rec2 (fun x : Formula => Q x -> P x) f1 f2 f3 f4 f5 (notH a) q = f4 a (Formula_depth_rec2 (fun x : Formula => Q x -> P x) f1 f2 f3 f4 f5 a) q

Premises:
Inductive sum (A B : Type) : Type := inl : A -> A + B | inr : B -> A + B Arguments sum (_ _)%type_scope Arguments inl {A B}%type_scope, [A] _ _ Arguments inr {A B}%type_scope, _ [B] _
Inductive t : nat -> Set := F1 : forall n : nat, Fin.t (S n) | FS : forall n : nat, Fin.t n -> Fin.t (S n) Arguments Fin.t _%nat_scope Arguments Fin.F1 {n}%nat_scope Arguments Fin.FS {n}%nat_scope
Relations = fun l : Language => let (Relations, Functions, _) := l in Relations : Language -> Set
arity : forall l : Language, Relations l + Functions l -> nat
Record Q : Set := Qmake { Qnum : BinNums.Z; Qden : BinNums.positive } Arguments QArith_base.Qmake _%Z_scope _%positive_scope
lt_depth = fun A B : Formula => depth A < depth B : Formula -> Formula -> Prop
Inductive Formula : Set := equal : Term -> Term -> Formula | atomic : forall r : Relations L, Terms (arity L (inl r)) -> Formula | impH : Formula -> Formula -> Formula | notH : Formula -> Formula | forallH : nat -> Formula -> Formula Arguments forallH _%nat_scope
forallH : nat -> Formula -> Formula
atomic : forall r : Relations L, Terms (arity L (inl r)) -> Formula
Formula_depth_rec2 : forall P : Formula -> Set, (forall t t0 : Term, P (equal t t0)) -> (forall (r : Relations L) (t : Terms (arity L (inl r))), P (atomic r t)) -> (forall f : Formula, P f -> forall f0 : Formula, P f0 -> P (impH f f0)) -> (forall f : Formula, P f -> P (notH f)) -> (forall (v : nat) (a : Formula), (forall b : Formula, lt_depth b (forallH v a) -> P b) -> P (forallH v a)) -> forall a : Formula, P a
Inductive nat : Set := O : nat | S : nat -> nat Arguments S _%nat_scope
Inductive Term : Set := var : nat -> Term | apply : forall f : Functions L, Terms (arity L (inr f)) -> Term with Terms : nat -> Set := Tnil : Terms 0 | Tcons : forall n : nat, Term -> Terms n -> Terms (S n) Arguments var _%nat_scope Arguments Terms _%nat_scope Arguments Tcons _%nat_scope

Formula_depth_rec_indep : forall (Q P : Formula -> Set) (rec : forall a : Formula, (forall b : Formula, lt_depth b a -> Q b -> P b) -> Q a -> P a), (forall (a : Formula) (z1 z2 : forall b : Formula, lt_depth b a -> Q b -> P b), (forall (b : Formula) (p : lt_depth b a) (q : Q b), z1 b p q = z2 b p q) -> forall q : Q a, rec a z1 q = rec a z2 q) -> forall (a : Formula) (q : Q a), Formula_depth_rec (fun x : Formula => Q x -> P x) rec a q = rec a (fun (b : Formula) (_ : lt_depth b a) => Formula_depth_rec (fun x : Formula => Q x ->...
Formula_depth_rec2rec : forall P : Formula -> Set, (forall t t0 : Term, P (equal t t0)) -> (forall (r : Relations L) (t : Terms (arity L (inl r))), P (atomic r t)) -> (forall f : Formula, P f -> forall f0 : Formula, P f0 -> P (impH f f0)) -> (forall f : Formula, P f -> P (notH f)) -> (forall (v : nat) (a : Formula), (forall b : Formula, lt_depth b (forallH v a) -> P b) -> P (forallH v a)) -> forall a : Formula, (forall b : Formula, lt_depth b a -> P b) -> P a
Formula_sind : forall P : Formula -> SProp, (forall t t0 : Term, P (equal t t0)) -> (forall (r : Relations L) (t : Terms (arity L (inl r))), P (atomic r t)) -> (forall f1 : Formula, P f1 -> forall f2 : Formula, P f2 -> P (impH f1 f2)) -> (forall f2 : Formula, P f2 -> P (notH f2)) -> (forall (n : nat) (f3 : Formula), P f3 -> P (forallH n f3)) -> forall f4 : Formula, P f4
Formula_rec : forall P : Formula -> Set, (forall t t0 : Term, P (equal t t0)) -> (forall (r : Relations L) (t : Terms (arity L (inl r))), P (atomic r t)) -> (forall f1 : Formula, P f1 -> forall f2 : Formula, P f2 -> P (impH f1 f2)) -> (forall f2 : Formula, P f2 -> P (notH f2)) -> (forall (n : nat) (f3 : Formula), P f3 -> P (forallH n f3)) -> forall f4 : Formula, P f4
Formula_ind : forall P : Formula -> Prop, (forall t t0 : Term, P (equal t t0)) -> (forall (r : Relations L) (t : Terms (arity L (inl r))), P (atomic r t)) -> (forall f1 : Formula, P f1 -> forall f2 : Formula, P f2 -> P (impH f1 f2)) -> (forall f2 : Formula, P f2 -> P (notH f2)) -> (forall (n : nat) (f3 : Formula), P f3 -> P (forallH n f3)) -> forall f4 : Formula, P f4
Formula_rect : forall P : Formula -> Type, (forall t t0 : Term, P (equal t t0)) -> (forall (r : Relations L) (t : Terms (arity L (inl r))), P (atomic r t)) -> (forall f1 : Formula, P f1 -> forall f2 : Formula, P f2 -> P (impH f1 f2)) -> (forall f2 : Formula, P f2 -> P (notH f2)) -> (forall (n : nat) (f3 : Formula), P f3 -> P (forallH n f3)) -> forall f4 : Formula, P f4
Formula_depth_rec : forall P : Formula -> Set, (forall a : Formula, (forall b : Formula, lt_depth b a -> P b) -> P a) -> forall a : Formula, P a
Formula_depth_rec_rec : forall P : Formula -> Set, (forall a : Formula, (forall b : Formula, lt_depth b a -> P b) -> P a) -> forall (n : nat) (b : Formula), depth b <= n -> P b
Nat.div_unique : forall a b q r : nat, r < b -> a = b * q + r -> q = a / b
Nat.mod_unique : forall a b q r : nat, r < b -> a = b * q + r -> r = a mod b
Nat.div_unique_exact : forall a b q : nat, b <> 0 -> a = b * q -> q = a / b
f_equal_nat : forall (B : Type) (f : nat -> B) (x y : nat), x = y -> f x = f y
Term_Terms_rec_full : forall (P : Term -> Set) (P0 : forall n : nat, Terms n -> Set), (forall n : nat, P (var n)) -> (forall (f0 : Functions L) (t : Terms (arity L (inr f0))), P0 (arity L (inr f0)) t -> P (apply f0 t)) -> P0 0 Tnil -> (forall (n : nat) (t : Term), P t -> forall t0 : Terms n, P0 n t0 -> P0 (S n) (Tcons n t t0)) -> forall t : Term, P t
Term_ind : forall P : Term -> Prop, (forall n : nat, P (var n)) -> (forall (f0 : Functions L) (t : Terms (arity L (inr f0))), P (apply f0 t)) -> forall t : Term, P t
Term_sind : forall P : Term -> SProp, (forall n : nat, P (var n)) -> (forall (f0 : Functions L) (t : Terms (arity L (inr f0))), P (apply f0 t)) -> forall t : Term, P t
Term_rec : forall P : Term -> Set, (forall n : nat, P (var n)) -> (forall (f0 : Functions L) (t : Terms (arity L (inr f0))), P (apply f0 t)) -> forall t : Term, P t
Term_rect : forall P : Term -> Type, (forall n : nat, P (var n)) -> (forall (f0 : Functions L) (t : Terms (arity L (inr f0))), P (apply f0 t)) -> forall t : Term, P t
Term_Terms_ind : forall (P : Term -> Prop) (P0 : forall n : nat, Terms n -> Prop), (forall n : nat, P (var n)) -> (forall (f0 : Functions L) (t : Terms (arity L (inr f0))), P0 (arity L (inr f0)) t -> P (apply f0 t)) -> P0 0 Tnil -> (forall (n : nat) (t : Term), P t -> forall t0 : Terms n, P0 n t0 -> P0 (S n) (Tcons n t t0)) -> forall t : Term, P t
Terms_Term_rec_full : forall (P : Term -> Set) (P0 : forall n : nat, Terms n -> Set), (forall n : nat, P (var n)) -> (forall (f0 : Functions L) (t : Terms (arity L (inr f0))), P0 (arity L (inr f0)) t -> P (apply f0 t)) -> P0 0 Tnil -> (forall (n : nat) (t : Term), P t -> forall t0 : Terms n, P0 n t0 -> P0 (S n) (Tcons n t t0)) -> forall (n : nat) (t : Terms n), P0 n t
sum_rect : forall (A B : Type) (P : A + B -> Type), (forall a : A, P (inl a)) -> (forall b : B, P (inr b)) -> forall s : A + B, P s
sum_rec : forall (A B : Type) (P : A + B -> Set), (forall a : A, P (inl a)) -> (forall b : B, P (inr b)) -> forall s : A + B, P s
sum_ind : forall (A B : Type) (P : A + B -> Prop), (forall a : A, P (inl a)) -> (forall b : B, P (inr b)) -> forall s : A + B, P s
sum_sind : forall (A B : Type) (P : A + B -> SProp), (forall a : A, P (inl a)) -> (forall b : B, P (inr b)) -> forall s : A + B, P s
Terms_Term_ind : forall (P : Term -> Prop) (P0 : forall n : nat, Terms n -> Prop), (forall n : nat, P (var n)) -> (forall (f0 : Functions L) (t : Terms (arity L (inr f0))), P0 (arity L (inr f0)) t -> P (apply f0 t)) -> P0 0 Tnil -> (forall (n : nat) (t : Term), P t -> forall t0 : Terms n, P0 n t0 -> P0 (S n) (Tcons n t t0)) -> forall (n : nat) (t : Terms n), P0 n t
count_occ_map : forall (A B : Type) (f : A -> B) (decA : forall x1 x2 : A, {x1 = x2} + {x1 <> x2}) (decB : forall y1 y2 : B, {y1 = y2} + {y1 <> y2}), (forall x1 x2 : A, f x1 = f x2 -> x1 = x2) -> forall (x : A) (l : list A), count_occ decA l x = count_occ decB (map f l) (f x)
Terms_rect : forall P : forall n : nat, Terms n -> Type, P 0 Tnil -> (forall (n : nat) (t : Term) (t0 : Terms n), P n t0 -> P (S n) (Tcons n t t0)) -> forall (n : nat) (t : Terms n), P n t
Terms_ind : forall P : forall n : nat, Terms n -> Prop, P 0 Tnil -> (forall (n : nat) (t : Term) (t0 : Terms n), P n t0 -> P (S n) (Tcons n t t0)) -> forall (n : nat) (t : Terms n), P n t
Terms_rec : forall P : forall n : nat, Terms n -> Set, P 0 Tnil -> (forall (n : nat) (t : Term) (t0 : Terms n), P n t0 -> P (S n) (Tcons n t t0)) -> forall (n : nat) (t : Terms n), P n t
